ThingDef.label: small log pile spot
ThingDef.description:
A designated spot to pile wood. Free to build. Deconstructing returns 100% of wood logs stored. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings. 

Total Capacity: 2 Stacks

Dynamic Textures

ThingDef.label: large log pile spot
ThingDef.description:
A designated spot to pile wood. Free to build. Deconstructing returns 100% of wood logs stored. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings. 

Total Capacity: 12 Stacks

Dynamic Textures

ThingDef.label: storage pit
ThingDef.description:
A dirt dugout that can store a range of items. Keeps perishable items slightly cooler underground, effective at around 65F/18C. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings. 
Occupies a 1x1 area underground.

Total Capacity: 25 Stacks

ThingDef.label: woven basket
ThingDef.description:
A woven basket designed for storing various items. Items stored inside do not affect the beauty of their surroundings.

Total Capacity: 10 Stacks

A stone cellar stone that can store a range of items. Keeps perishable items slightly cooler underground, effective at around 74F/23C. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings. 
Occupies a 3x3 area underground. 

Total Capacity: 175 Stacks

ThingDef.label: double chest fridge
ThingDef.description: A fridge that can freeze up to 6 items. Does not function in temperatures above 100C.

ThingDef.label: single wall fridge
ThingDef.description: A fridge that can freeze up to 3 items. Does not function in temperatures above 100C. Cannot support the roof.

ThingDef.label: double wall fridge
ThingDef.description: A fridge that can freeze up to 6 items. Does not function in temperatures above 100C. Cannot support the roof.

ThingDef.label: corpse fridge
ThingDef.description: A fridge that can freeze up to 20 corpses. Does not function in temperatures above 100C.

ThingDef.Name: SmallCargoCompartment

ThingDef.description: A refrigerated cargo hold perfect for small ships. Keeps your items stowed and safely tucked away under the floor. Needs 300w of electricity to refrigerate. \n\nTotal Capacity: 100 Stacks

ThingDef.label: toxic waste container
ThingDef.description: a high pressure gas container that can safely store great amounts of toxic waste and degrade them at a fairly slow rate... n/n/ no... it's still not that safe to store inside. if you didn't treat them well,it'll easily became a giant toxic bomb.

ThingDef.label: Food Basket
ThingDef.description: A mini-granary for storing raw food and plant matter.

ThingDef.label: Big Shelf
ThingDef.description: A shelf for storing miscellaneous items, from artillery shells to artwork, from bionic arms to bricks, from chairs to corpses. It doesn't ask questions; it just stores things. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside. This shelf holds twice as much as the regular one.

ThingDef.label: Big Single Shelf
ThingDef.description: A shelf for storing miscellaneous items, from artillery shells to artwork, from bionic arms to bricks, from chairs to corpses. It doesn't ask questions; it just stores things. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside. This shelf holds twice as much as the regular one.

ThingDef.label: Clothing Rack
ThingDef.description: A covered rack for storing clothing for easy, quick access and a tidy room.

ThingDef.label: Hampers
ThingDef.description: This is a set of hampers made out of fabric. The various pockets allow storing large amounts of diverse small items with ease. If you really want to store fabric in bags, see the mod settings!

ThingDef.label: Hayloft
ThingDef.description: "A hayloft is a space above a barn, stable or cow-shed, traditionally used for storage of hay or other fodder for the animals below. Haylofts were used mainly before the widespread use of industrial sized farm machinery allowed creating very large haybales that cannot be easily lifted for storing..." --Encyclopedia Galactica Let's be honest here. Unless you're using some farming mods I don't know about, your colonists are probably making piles of hay by hand, which is slow, backbreaking labor. You know what? Most farming is slow, backbreaking labor, and your colonists can't even hire migrant workers from other colonies. Treat farmers and farm workers with respect: they work a lot harder than YOU do ;) Amazing people, good food. This structure can be used to store hay, silage, and various other plant materials off of damp floors. You probably want to build it under a (very tall) roof.

ThingDef.label: Meat Hook
ThingDef.description: A tall metal frame with several hooks hanging from chains. A simple crank allows hoisting several hanging things into the air. A way to store the dead bodies of fellow animals you have killed, before cutting them up and consuming their flesh. You monster. Note that you can only fit so many giant corpses into one space, even if you stack them. The frame will only hold so much weight.

ThingDef.label: Medicine Cabinet
ThingDef.description: A set of cabinets and shelves for stocking medicines and drugs. Recommended: keep an eye on children.

ThingDef.label: Pallet
ThingDef.description: A flat pallet for packing things. Does not protect against the weather. Sometimes difficult to manage, but useful nonetheless.

ThingDef.label: Safe
ThingDef.description: A secure, lockable box for safely storing valuables against theft and/or damage from fire. Note: protection from fire not yet implemented.

ThingDef.label: Skip
ThingDef.description: A large metal bin for tossing heavy things in. These skips are not covered; they are open to the weather. Note: Tossing large amounts of steel in willy-nilly means that it takes a while to find the steel you want later. The mod author has abstracted that as a longer time for storing large stacks of items. Pretend your pawns have to climb in and stack everything so the doggies can pick it up easily.

ThingDef.label: Meal Tray Rack
ThingDef.description: This is a tall tray rack; haulers carry meals and treats here for storage.

ThingDef.label: Tall Shelf
ThingDef.description: A tall covered shelf for storing miscellaneous items, from artillery shells to artwork, from bionic arms to bricks, from chairs to corpses. Pawns access the top shelves using a small rolling ladder (currently not pictured), so while many things can be stored here, it can take a while if you're putting a lot of tiny bottles on the top shelf. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside. Note: Use your own judgment about what you put here. Grand Sculptures? Probably don't ACTUALLY fit. But if that's what you want here, you play you!

ThingDef.label: Tall Single Shelf
ThingDef.description: A tall covered shelf for storing miscellaneous items, from artillery shells to artwork, from bionic arms to bricks, from chairs to corpses. Pawns access the top shelves using a small rolling ladder (currently not pictured), so while many things can be stored here, it can take a while if you're putting a lot of tiny bottles on the top shelf. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside. Note: Use your own judgment about what you put here. Grand Sculptures? Probably don't ACTUALLY fit. But if that's what you want here, you play you!

ThingDef.label: Weapons Cabinet
ThingDef.description: A sturdy cabinet for storing multiple weapons. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.

ThingDef.label: Weapons Locker
ThingDef.description: A high-capacity metal locker for securely storing many weapons. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.

ThingDef.label: Large Bundle
ThingDef.description: Materials tightly wrapped and safely stored. It stores commonly used crafting and building materials, as well as some plant matter. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.\n\nRotate to change appearence.

ThingDef.label: Sack
ThingDef.description: A small sack that can be used to store raw food and plant matter. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.\n\nRotate to change appearence.

ThingDef.label: Cargo Container
ThingDef.description: A big cargo container used to store large amounts of almost anything. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

ThingDef.label: Cask
ThingDef.description: A wooden cask meant to store mainly beer and wine, but it can also store all kinds of other drugs. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

ThingDef.label: Medium Crate
ThingDef.description: A wooden Crate meant to store commonly used crafting and building materials. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.\n\nRotate to change appearance.

ThingDef.label: Large Crate
ThingDef.description: A wooden Crate meant to store commonly used crafting and building materials. Its large size allows it to also store already constructed buildings. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.\n\nRotate to change appearance.

ThingDef.label: Food Barrel
ThingDef.description: A wooden barrel capable of holding all kinds of foodstuffs and plant matter. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.\n\nThis building has content-specific textures.

ThingDef.label: Pantry Shelf
ThingDef.description: A sturdy shelf capable of holding all kinds of foodstuffs and plant matter. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

ThingDef.label: Fuel Tank
ThingDef.description: A fuel tank for storing chemfuel among other things.Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

ThingDef.label: Industrial Dumpster
ThingDef.description: A well-made metal container. Its sturdy construction allows it to hold metal and stone chunks. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

ThingDef.label: Meal Cupboard
ThingDef.description: A small cupboard, capable of storing a surprising amount of finished meals.

ThingDef.label: Meat Hook
ThingDef.description: A Meathook meant to store a larger amount of corpses in a small space. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

ThingDef.label: Metal Crate
ThingDef.description: A metal crate meant to store commonly used crafting and building materials. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.\n\nThis building has content-specific textures.

ThingDef.label: Large Pallet
ThingDef.description: A pallet that keeps your things a bit more organized and away from the ground. It can store raw resources and other commonly used materials. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.\n\nThis building has content-specific textures.

ThingDef.label: Small Pallet
ThingDef.description: A small pallet that keeps your things a bit more organized and away from the ground. It can store raw resources and other commonly used materials. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.\n\nThis building has content-specific textures.

ThingDef.label: Small Crate
ThingDef.description: A wooden crate meant to store commonly used crafting and building materials. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.\n\nThis building has content-specific textures.

ThingDef.label: Pot
ThingDef.description: The most basic of all storage vessels, the pot. It's capable of holding foodstuffs and raw resources. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.\n\nRotate to change appearance.

ThingDef.label: Weapon Rack
ThingDef.description: A rack designed for the efficient storage of many different weapons. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

ThingDef.label: animal feeder
ThingDef.description: A specialized storage container designed to hold food for feeding your colony animals. Items stored inside will not deteriorate over time and have no impact on the beauty of their surroundings. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 18 Stack per tile: 9 Allowed items: Hay, Kibble

ThingDef.label: barrel
ThingDef.description: A compact barrel designed for storage of common goods, including raw food, plant materials, medicines, textiles, and crafted resources. Prevents deterioration, but perishable items may still need freezing. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 9 Stack per tile: 9 Allowed items: Raw Plants, Herbal medicine, Animal Products, Chocolate, Plant matter, Raw fish, Wort, Hemogen, Condiments

ThingDef.label: fridge
ThingDef.description:
A sealed metal container designed to keep your perishable food safe, frozen, and easily accessible for both lunch and dinner. Items stored inside will not rot over time and have no impact on the beauty of their surroundings, as long as it's powered. 

<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 12 Stack per tile: 6 Allowed items: Foods, Plant matter, Alcohol, Beverages, Musts, Hay, Condiments 

<color=#0094FF>Items stored can be frozen when powered.</color>

ThingDef.label: double shelf
ThingDef.description: A shelf designed to hold a wide variety of items, including meals and raw food. Items stored inside will not deteriorate over time, however you will still need to freeze certain items to prevent spoilage. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 20 Stack per tile: 10 Allowed items: Meals, Raw Food, Everything except Corpses and Chunks

ThingDef.label: industrial skip
ThingDef.description: An industrial-grade skip designed to hold various types of waste, including corpses, chunks, slags, and wastepacks. Items stored inside will not deteriorate over time and have no impact on the beauty of their surroundings, however you will still need to freeze certain items. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 18 Stack per tile: 9 Allowed items: Chunks, Corpses, Wastepacks, Recycle packs, Fecal sludge

ThingDef.label: apparel locker
ThingDef.description: A large metal locker with a window designed to keep your apparel safe, secure, and easily accessible for outfitting your colonists. Items stored inside will not deteriorate over time and have no impact on the beauty of their surroundings. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 20 Stack per tile: 10 Allowed items: Apparel, Armor, Headgear

ThingDef.label: large metal crate
ThingDef.description: A stack of five sturdy metal crates designed for storing mass quantities of goods and valuables. Items stored inside will not deteriorate over time and have no impact on the beauty of their surroundings. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 52 Stack per tile: 13 Allowed items: Everything except Foods, Corpses and Chunks

ThingDef.label: large crate
ThingDef.description: A collection of wooden crates designed for storing mass quantities of goods and valuables. Items stored inside will not deteriorate over time and have no impact on the beauty of their surroundings. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 40 Stack per tile: 10 Allowed items: Everything except Foods, Corpses and Chunks

ThingDef.label: meat hook
ThingDef.description: A specialized rack designed to hold raw meat and corpses for butchering or disposal. Items stored inside will not deteriorate over time and have no impact on the beauty of their surroundings, however you will still need to freeze them. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 16 Stack per tile: 8 Allowed items: Raw meat, Fish, Corpses

ThingDef.label: medical cabinet
ThingDef.description:
A compact shelf designed to hold medicine, body parts, drugs, and plant matter. Items stored inside will not rot over time and have no impact on the beauty of their surroundings, as long as it's powered. 

<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 36 Stack per tile: 18 Allowed items: Medicine, Plant Matter, Drugs, Neutroamine, Body parts, Medical equipment 

<color=#0094FF>Items stored can be frozen when powered.</color>

ThingDef.label: metal crate
ThingDef.description: A sturdy metal crate designed for storing mass quantities of goods and valuables. Items stored inside will not deteriorate over time and have no impact on the beauty of their surroundings. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 10 Stack per tile: 10 Allowed items: Everything except Foods, Corpses and Chunks

ThingDef.label: apparel locker
ThingDef.description: A larger metal locker with a window designed to keep your apparel safe, secure, and easily accessible for outfitting your colonists. Items stored inside will not deteriorate over time and have no impact on the beauty of their surroundings. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 20 Stack per tile: 10 Allowed items: Apparel, Armor, Headgear

ThingDef.label: medicine cabinet
ThingDef.description:
A compact shelf designed to hold medicine, body parts, drugs, and plant matter. Items stored inside will not deteriorate over time and have no impact on the beauty of their surroundings, however you will still need to freeze certain items. 

<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 18 Stack per tile: 9 Allowed items: Medicine, Plant Matter, Drugs, Neutroamine, Body parts 

<color=#0094FF>Items stored can be frozen when powered.</color>

ThingDef.label: vertical weapon rack
ThingDef.description: A specialized rack designed to display numerous melee and ranged weapons for armories and outposts. Items stored inside will not deteriorate over time. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 16 Stack per tile: 8 Allowed items: Ranged weapons, Melee weapons, Explosives

ThingDef.label: horizontal weapon rack
ThingDef.description: A specialized rack designed to display numerous melee and ranged weapons for armories and outposts. Items stored inside will not deteriorate over time. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 16 Stack per tile: 8 Allowed items: Ranged weapons, Melee weapons, Explosives

ThingDef.label: crate
ThingDef.description: A sturdy wooden crate designed for storing mass quantities of goods and valuables. Items stored inside will not deteriorate over time and have no impact on the beauty of their surroundings. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 8 Stack per tile: 8 Allowed items: Everything except Foods, Corpses and Chunks
